column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I really wanted to give this place a five but I expected perfection and I did not get it. But this is def a place to try for a nice dinner. I loved the rose martinis had two of those and was feeling great. Service was also attentive and polite. The food I ordered chicago ribey
column3: and short rib stronganoff. Â Meat was cooked perfectly
column4: elote corn was delish but didnt fit in with my meal and the stronganoff was simple and needed either more sauce or seasoning. Was too full for dessert. Honestly I love gilt bar so much I just thought this would be better but it wasn't. Gilt bar still takes top spot right now.
